titleStmt.title: De arte supputandi libri quattuor Cutheberti Tonstalli
titleStmt.author: Tunstall, Cuthbert, 1474-1559.
Budé, Guillaume, 1468-1540.

publicationStmt.date: Anno Verbi incarnati. M.D.XXII. pridie idus Octobris [1522 (14 Oct.)]]

notesStmt.note: Signatures: A-S⁴ T⁶ TV⁶ V⁶ X-Z⁴ a⁴ ab⁶ b-z⁴ &⁴.
"Appendix ex Budaei libro De asse excerpta", z4r-&3v.
Title page verso has errata. Variant: title page verso is blank.

Quires C and Z are each in three settings. C1r has (1) no catchword, or catchword (2) "Qu[a]estio" or (3) "Verum,". Z1r lines 12 and 21 have (1) "communis #5FD\ addit[a]e" or (2) com̄unis #5FD\ addit[a]e" or (3) "communis #5FD\ additæ".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
